archimate:BusinessService.name: Consumer Loan
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: A consumer customer applies for and gets a loan to purchase new furniture.
General comment:
Business Purpose : Fulfillment of a range of loan products for consumer clients
Пример использования: Потребитель подает заявку и получает кредит на приобретение новой мебели.
Общее замечание:
деловая цель : Выполнение ряда кредитных продуктов для розничных клиентов
Service Domain - Consumer Loan The consumer loan product may include different properties/features depending on a bank's preferences and policies. The loan is targeted at consumer customer and may be associated with a type of product and may or may not be secured by collateral.
Detailed Summary This service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product. This includes the initial set-up of the loan facility and the completion of scheduled and ad-hoc product processing tasks.
Executive Summary This service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product. This includes the initial set-up of the loan facility and the completion of scheduled and ad-hoc product processing tasks.
Examples Of Use A consumer customer applies for and gets a loan to purchase new furniture.
